column1: [Multiple Choice] How do you benefit from learning in GitHub?

column3: Other (please specify)
I can do things on my own, and learn according to what I want to know.
I don't.
The ability to make contributions to projects in my field, and learn through mentoring of the maintainers of said projects.
Helping me solve already solved problems and lets me focus on problems that are not yet solved. Makes it more interesting.
was not aware GitHub had a learning feature
I do not focus on GitHub itself as the definitive reason for learning. Benifit is simply learning which is not a GitHub specific concept.
open source benefit
the synergy of the diverse community
I haven't tried it
github is just a code collaboration platform
nothing is special about learning with github repos, it is just a place to put code in the lessons

differing perspectives, and multiple answers that are still correct
Keep the pace with new technology, in a fast way.
A big portion is the IRC or slack channels where questions can be resolved faster than raising an issue.
